title: Calling All Businesses Still Operating with Outdated, Expired Software: The Office Technology Group Offering a Complimentary Unsupported & Unsecure Software Audit
text:
Free audit gives companies a chance to remove the risk of doing business with retired operating systems & take on an easy & efficient migration with no disruptions
MILWAUKEE, Wis.
The Office Technology Group (OTG), a provider of IT business services and customized solutions to companies throughout the Milwaukee and Appleton, Wisconsin, areas, today announced it’s providing small and medium-sized businesses a complimentary Unsupported and Unsecure Software Audit valued at $199. By ordering this free assessment, participating businesses lessen the dangers of losing vital data and information to cyberattacks targeting vulnerable network infrastructures due to using out-of-date operating systems and other outdated business software. The offer for the evaluation runs now through September 30, 2015.
“Those businesses that have chosen to remain with outdated operating systems like Windows XP and Windows Server 2003 and don’t upgrade to a newer supported version face exposing their business data, financial records and network stability to detrimental risks,” said Mat Wolfgram, vice president, OTG. “We believe these businesses shouldn’t gamble with the dangers of using unsupported and unsecure software to run their operations. They need to be concerned about security and compliance issues, and update their business software to reduce costs, improve efficiency and increase productivity.”
For more information about OTG’s free Unsupported and Unsecure Software Audit, please visit http://www.theotg.com or call 414.475.0522.
About The Office Technology Group
The Office Technology Group (OTG), founded in 1991, is a managed IT service provider (MSP) that offers premium IT support, consulting and business technology solutions to small and medium businesses throughout Milwaukee and Appleton, Wisconsin, as well as surrounding areas. Some of the company’s most popular business solutions include managed printing services and cloud management services, including software workflow, IT consulting, data backup and disaster recovery. The company attributes its long-time success and growth to a reputation built by doing right by others. For more information about OTG and its IT support solutions, visit the company on the web at http://www.theotg.com . To learn more now, call 414.475.0522 (Milwaukee) or 920.750.7730 (Appleton). Also, to get the latest industry news and trends, go to http://www.theotg.com/blog .
